content.text:
Portfolio review complete.  

‚Ä¢ Current status:  
  ‚Äì Cash: $10,000  
  ‚Äì Holdings: none  
  ‚Äì Net worth: $10,000  

‚Ä¢ Market-scanning and order-entry tools are presently returning a ‚Äúmissing model parameter‚Äù error, preventing reliable price queries or trade execution.  

‚Ä¢ Risk-management decision: rather than place blind orders without confirmed quotes, I will hold the entire $10,000 in cash for the moment. Preserving capital takes priority over forced trades in uncertain technical conditions.  

‚Ä¢ Next-run plan:  
  1. Resolve the tool-parameter issue so market data and order placement work normally.  
  2. Once fixed, deploy an initial allocation (e.g., 60-80 % into a broad-market ETF such as SPY or QQQ and 20-40 % into 2-3 high-momentum names identified from up-to-date scans).  
  3. Keep at least 15-20 % cash available for flexibility.  

No trades executed this cycle.
